reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, keeping everything tight, and appreciate its built-in shapewear that hugs curves in all the right places.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and comfy dress
items.body: I ordered this dress last minute to wear out to a dinner anniversary date with my husband. I’m 55 yo and wanted to wear something a little edgy and sexy to what I normally wear. For reference I am 160 lbs and 5’4”. This dress fit like a glove! I ordered the large while I normally wear a size 6 in dresses. My bust is 36c and hips about 41. I love that it has the built in shapewear and that you can zip it low for some cleavage! I wore a strapless bra with it and let me tell ya, my hubby couldn’t keep his eyes off me! If you’re on the fence get it! Now it did feel a bit warm since it’s pleather but being inside AC I had no issues with overheating. Now I want to order it in red and can see myself wearing this black number with tall boots and a denim jacket! My new favorite dress Read more
items.author: PA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Say YES to this dress!
items.body: This is so awesome! It keep everything in tight but was super comfortable! Normally I need a bra but this was super supportive. Great material not see through at all. Love the zipper as well! Read more
items.author: Gia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXTREMELY Well Made and VERY High Quality!
items.body: My wife is an amateur bodybuilder and was looking for a dress with shape control that she can wear now in the off season while she is bulking. She tends to put on extra weight in her tummy area and this dress looked like a great solution. Since she is muscular, her measurements are a bit unique. She is 5'7", current weight about 175 lbs. Bra size is 38C but when flexing her chest is over 40". Hips are around 38". We bought a size Large. The quality of this dress is off the hook. Very well made and great material. Stitching is fantastic as well. Getting into the dress was a bit difficult. The bottom part of the dress as well as the first arm was no problem, but getting the last arm and shoulder in was a tight fit. This is not a fault of the dress; it's just because of the unique build my wife has (biceps are about 15", and she has broad shoulders). Once on, it looked FANTASTIC on her and she said it is extremely comfortable. Her only complaint is that it will be a chore going to the bathroom. She will need to take the top half off and pull down the dress and that (for her anyway) will be difficult. We don't want to size up to an XL because it fits perfectly when it is on. In the end we are both very pleased with this dress and feel it is well worth the money spent. EDIT: We noticed later when she wore it out to a club that the dress has an open gusset. Going to the bathroom was VERY easy. So, for her anyway, the dress is absolutely perfect! ADDITIONAL EDIT: She loved the dress so much we got one in red too. Same great quality and fit. You need to try this dress; you will not be disappointed! Read more
items.author: Steve R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price tag!
items.body: I’m 5’5”, 150 lbs with a 36DD chest and ordered the medium. It fit like a glove! You definitely can’t wear a bra with it because the zipper won’t close, but the dress itself gives a very flattering fit. It’s a classy yet sexy piece—perfect for dinner or a night out since it’s form-fitting. I was impressed with how well it hid my tummy, even at my “worst weight” of a 35” waist. I’d say anyone around 130–150 lbs with medium to large bust (DD or similar) would look amazing in this dress. The fabric feels great, the quality is worth the price, and overall I absolutely love it! Read more
items.author: Anaya

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disintegrated after 1 wash
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I'm changing my 5 ⭐ review to a 1 ⭐ review because this dress completely disintegrated in the wash after I wore it one time. It left black pepper like flakes all over my laundry room. I followed the washing instructions to the letter. An $80 dress should not be destroyed after wearing it once and washing it once. Very disappointing. This is one of the most flattering and comfortable sexy little black dresses I have ever owned. The quality is excellent and it washes up beautifully on cold water in the gentle cycle! Every girl needs a couple of little black dresses that they can wear and feel confident and sexy in. But the bonus on this one is that it's so amazingly comfortable. I didn't even need to wear a bra with it and I'm a 36G. I highly recommend this dress! Take care when zipping it up over the breasts I did accidentally get my skin caught in the zipper. Trust me, you're going to love this dress and turn some heads when you wear it.❤️❤️❤️❤️ Read more
items.author: Ann Marie Rosenbecker

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit, But Poor-Quality Material Again
items.body: I have a collection of dresses from Popilush, and it’s always the same outcome. The concept of having shapewear built into the dress is genius—it really makes you look snatched! This dress fits well, and I received a lot of compliments while wearing it. However, like the others, the material is flimsy and ripped easily. They really need to use better quality fabric. It’s a shame because the fit is great, but the durability just isn’t there Read more
items.author: chris nieves

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So close. Would look fabulous on many.
items.body: The dress is lovely, surprisingly stretchy and comfortable. The idea of the built in shape wear is brilliant imo. Unfortunately it didn’t fit me just right. Showed a too much side boob. I was able to get it zipped without significant issue but I think the problem overall is it was just a bit small for me. For reference I’m 5’8” and 215 lbs, carry a lot of weight in my middle. Read more
items.author: Supergirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wife loves this dress
items.body: Have purchased dozens of dresses from Amazon for my wife and this is one of her current favorites. She looks great in it and it fits like a glove. The dress is true to size and the material looks great. It's not too thick but not thin either and supports in all the right ways. It doesn't look exactly like leather but close enough and stretches when you need it. She didn't really need the shapewear support but ended up liking it. The zipper down the front gives this dress 2 different looks. The quality appears very good but time will tell. I love the way she looks in it. Highly recommended! Read more
items.author: BP

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Pink, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
